tool_description: Calculates portfolio returns using various methodologies including simple, logarithmic, and time-weighted returns for performance analysis.

prices.description: Array of portfolio values over time

timestamps.description: Array of timestamps corresponding to price values

return_type.description: Type of return calculation: simple, logarithmic, time_weighted

cash_flows.description: Array of cash flows corresponding to timestamps (positive for inflows, negative for outflows)

error_messages: Array length mismatch: prices and timestamps arrays must have the same length.
Insufficient data: At least 2 data points required for return calculation.
Invalid return type: Use simple, logarithmic, or time_weighted.
Cash flow mismatch: If provided, cash_flows array must match length of prices array.
Zero or negative prices: All price values must be positive for valid return calculations.
usage: Provide price and timestamp arrays to calculate returns. Optionally specify return methodology, annualization, and cash flows for accurate time-weighted returns.
